title: Level Resources to Smooth Workload
description: A PM uses resource leveling to resolve over-allocations by delaying non-critical tasks to smooth out the workload for the carpentry crew.

tasks.description: Run the resource leveling tool on the project schedule, focusing on the 'Carpentry Crew'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool identifies over-allocations and suggests delaying several non-critical tasks.

tasks.description: Accept the suggested changes to delay non-critical tasks and resolve the over-allocations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project schedule is updated, and the resource graph for the crew is now level.
